name: optimizely-oui

scripts.start: bundle install && bundle update && npm install && ./node_modules/.bin/gulp hook
scripts.preversion: git checkout master && git pull && npm install
scripts.postversion: npm run postversion:publish && npm run postversion:update-devel
scripts.postversion:update-devel: git checkout devel && git pull && git merge master && git push origin devel && git checkout master

author: Tom Genoni, Cheston Lee, Daniel O'Connor, Kelly Walker, Tim Scanlin
